text: 13.8 Kis 32.32, Sng 69.28, Dan 12.1, Plp 4.3, Lep 3.5, 5.6, 17.8, 20.12-15, 21.27 Binɨb mɨdupsek tek, tap ladek anɨb ak yɨb nop dad aplanɨl kɨdek gɨnɨgabal. Pen bɨlel bɨlel man ma alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak, God binɨb pel yenɨgabal agɨl, yɨb kɨlop mɨj ayaŋ ñu kɨl tɨkak. Mɨj anɨb ak, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ñag lel kumak ak mɨj ne. Binɨb anɨb okok nep, tap ladek anɨb anop kɨdek ma gɨnɨgabal.
